sentences.sContent: So how do we strengthen our skeptical skills?
sentences.sContent_eng: So how do we strengthen our skeptical skills?
sentences.sCn: 那么，我们如何加强自身的怀疑技能呢？

sentences.sContent: Not all theory that we read in this course is skeptical.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not all theory that we read in this course is skeptical.
sentences.sCn: 我们在这门课中提及的理论不全是怀疑性的。

sentences.sContent: L.M.:Well, I was skeptical myself in the beginning. But these are facts. The findings are very reproducible and we are waiting for confirmation by other labs.
sentences.sContent_eng: L.M.:Well, I was skeptical myself in the beginning. But these are facts. The findings are very reproducible and we are waiting for confirmation by other labs.
sentences.sCn: 大爷：我老人家一开始也是很怀疑的。但是这个是事实。这个发现可以被反复验证，我们正在等待别的实验是的验证。

sentences.sContent: ...I confess I enter this in a skeptical frame of mind...
...Why is the author skeptical of the data revolution...
...skeptical of whether they could trust their employees to work to full capacity without supervision...

exam.question: Many scientists remain ______ about the value of this research program.

answer.explain: 句意： 许多科学家仍怀疑这一研究项目的科学价值。stationary： 固定的； spacious： 广阔的； specific： 明确的。

synos.tran: 怀疑的；怀疑论的，不可知论的

words.tran: 怀疑论者；怀疑者；无神论者
